title: Oracles of God - The Book of Revelation
description:
This album is the first half of my word for word rendition of the Book of Revelation in progressive metal.  Enshrining the Book of Revelation in metal has been a dream of mine since I was a teenager. My primary purpose in making music is to share my work with others, so I have uploaded my album here.  I sincerely hope you enjoy listening to Revelation Chapters 1-11 and also that you will look forward to chapters 12-22 which I am working on presently.  

You can also directly download this album and all my other work from my website oraclesofgod.org
